title: Come Closer
features: A haunted survivor. A forbidden attraction. A race against time.
The newest patient at Hawthorne Hill Mental Hospital hasn’t spoken a word since witnessing the murder of her sister. Allison Cole lost more than a sibling that day—she also lost her will to live.

Hawthorne’s Dr. Daniel Delgado is immediately drawn to his mysterious patient. He came to the rural Montana hospital to atone for his past, but the closer he gets to Allison, the more he begins to wonder if maybe he’s been given a second chance he never thought he’d have.

Daniel fights his desire to cross professional boundaries as he finds himself in a desperate race to put the pieces of Allison’s silence together. And the more he learns, the more he realizes that her silence may be the only thing keeping her alive.
This is a new release of an edition originally published by Silver Sky Publishing, Inc.
description: Review

About the Author

Brenda Rothert is a proud indie author who loves writing stories that make readers laugh, cry and occasionally, yell at their e-readers. Her Contemporary New Adult Romances include The Now Series - Now and Then, Now and Again and Now and Forever (March 2014 release), The Fire on Ice Series - Bound and Captive (Jan 2014 release) and Dystopian New Adult Romance Jocale. Brenda lives in Central Illinois with her husband and three boys.
